description: Have you ever wanted to take your professor over your knee and do nasty things to her? Well Dana has & does! Lindsey is a TA at Dana's institution and would rather work than play. That is until Dana invokes her privilege & we see who the real "instructor" is. Dana is a nasty whore who loves deep ass fisting and play and will stop at nothing to have as much flesh stuffed in her ass as possible. Watch as she uses Lindsey as an anal fuck toy in the most nasty ways possible...
title: Hot for Teacher
